# -*- ck2.events -*-

################################################################################
# WARNING: Do NOT modify this file manually!

# This file is code-generated and any manual changes will be overwritten.

# Generated by src/religion_codegen.py
################################################################################

########################################
##	  RELIGION EVENTS (CODEGEN)	  ##
########################################

# These events are meant to create and maintain dummy characters, each of whose sole utility
# is to have a specific religion as their public religion.
# They are used because some religion-based triggers (e.g. is_heretic, is_heresy_of,
# is_parent_religion) do not work in religion scopes and only check for characters' public
# religion, not their true religion. This means that in order to check whether a character's
# true religion complies with one of these triggers, the game needs to run the trigger on the
# dummy character whose public religion matches the given character's true religion.

namespace = emf_religion_codegen

# emf_religion_codegen.0 -- initialize dummy religion characters
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.0

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes
	
	religion = hip_religion

				dynasty = none
				religion = tondrakian
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}

				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { aztec = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_alive = yes } } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = aztec
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}

				}

			limit = { NOT = { taoist = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_alive = yes } } } }

				dynasty = none
				religion = taoist
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no

				set_immune_to_pruning = yes

				emf_do_not_disturb = yes

				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				religion_scope = {
					save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = PREV }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_religion_codegen.1 -- handle the death of a religion dummy character [on_death]
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	has_character_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character

	immediate = {
		religion_scope = {
			if = {
				limit = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { character = PREVPREV } }
				clear_persistent_event_target = emf_religion_dummy_character
				event_target:isis = { character_event = { id = emf_religion_codegen.0 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_religion_codegen.2 -- compatibility sweep with older saves that have dummy religion characters set as global event targets
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.2

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes
	
	religion = hip_religion

	trigger = {
		has_landed_title = e_hip
		OR = {
			event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
			event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_alive = yes }
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			catholic = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_catholic_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			cathar = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_cathar_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			fraticelli = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_fraticelli_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			waldensian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_waldensian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			lollard = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_lollard_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			adoptionist = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_adoptionist_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			arian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_arian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			orthodox = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_orthodox_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			bogomilist = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_bogomilist_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			monothelite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_monothelite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			iconoclast = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_iconoclast_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			syriac = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_syriac_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			maronite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_maronite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			miaphysite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_miaphysite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			monophysite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_monophysite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			apostolic = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_apostolic_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			paulician = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_paulician_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			tondrakian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_tondrakian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			nestorian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_nestorian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			messalian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_messalian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			sunni = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_sunni_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			zikri = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zikri_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			mahdiyya = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			nabawiyya = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			ibadi = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_ibadi_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			kharijite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_kharijite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			haruri = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_haruri_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			shiite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_shiite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			waqifi = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_waqifi_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			zaydi = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zaydi_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			hurufi = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hurufi_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			ismaili = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_ismaili_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			druze = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_druze_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			qarmatian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_qarmatian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			norse_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			norse_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			tengri_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			tengri_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			baltic_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			baltic_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			finnish_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			finnish_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			aztec_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			aztec = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_aztec_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			slavic_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			slavic_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			west_african_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			west_african_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			zun_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			zun_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			hellenic_pagan_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			hellenic_pagan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			bon_reformed = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			bon = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_bon_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			zoroastrian = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			mazdaki = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_mazdaki_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			zurvanist = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zurvanist_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			manichean = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_manichean_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			mandaean = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_mandaean_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			yazidi = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_yazidi_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			khurmazta = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_khurmazta_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			jewish = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_jewish_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			samaritan = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_samaritan_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			karaite = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_karaite_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			hindu = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hindu_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			buddhist = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_buddhist_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			jain = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_jain_dummy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } }
			taoist = { save_persistent_event_target = { name = emf_religion_dummy_character scope = event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy } }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_taoist_dummy
		}
	}
}
